text: A mountain bike (or mountain bicycle) is a type of bicycle that is made for riding off-road. Mountain bikes are like other bicycles, but are usually stronger and heavier. Mountain bikes usually have suspension, stronger brakes, bigger tires, and a stronger frame than most other bicycles. While they can be used like a normal bicycle, mountain bikes are usually used for mountain biking. Category:Human-powered vehicles Category:Cycling
title: Mountain bike
